text.section: Each warehouse shall pay to the department an annual license fee of one hundred twenty-five dollars ($125). A license fee shall be paid on each warehouse building operated as a place of sale for tobacco, regardless of the number of such buildings owned by any individual, corporation, firm, or other type of management organization. It shall be paid on July 1 of each year.

The one hundred twenty-five dollar ($125) fee per license collected by the department shall be used by the department to carry out its functions under KRS 248.290 to 248.440. All fines collected for violations of the provisions of KRS 248.350 shall be paid into the State Treasury to the credit of a revolving account to be used in the enforcement of KRS 248.350.

law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 183, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 270, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 1, effective May 18, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4814c-16.
